column5: Dad & Cousin Pete out for 3 hours this afternoon in Dad's boat, seems like every time I got a fish I got crowded out of the area, they kept saying they were just coming over to see my fish HAHA, my partner backed out last minute Head ache, I lost 3 more and broke off one on a rock & Pete lost about six partly because he was catching more than My Dad & he was knocking them off with the net LOL, Pete lost one well over 20" & at the end of the day said he never thought he would be fishing for smallies in 43 degree water & that was the best day of fishing he's had in a long time even though he only landed one, I got 1 other 14" no picture, what a great day, hopefully back out Friday &/or Monday, MAYBE Saturday, don't want to push my luck  Richard
AWESOME stuff SBK!  Now i definitely wish i had not put the boat away...lol.
some nice lookin fish! 43? its stilll warm there hahaha about 38 here on a good day
Lake X is definitely producing for you Richard... wtg bro
let me guess...your dad is the one with the white beard...  ( bet in a snowstorm it would be hard to tell you two apart  nice goin Richard
Beauty report Richard Good looking bronzebacks  Did you get those on tubes?? Thanks for sharing Leechman

Ya Dad's the one in the white beard  Dad & I caught them on tubes & Pete used a small Storm jig with a minnow shaped twister tail on blueish green, he had as many on as I caught & gave it to me after we were done, I'll try it next time Richard
beauty fish for sure thanks again for the report
Beauty report Richard Thanks for sharing!
Nice smallies. On tubes hey? Good to hear they still hit artificials with the cold water temps. Thanks for sharing.
